fields.description: Due to the new Activity Indicator implemented on Android (TIMOB-6092), the test Controls -> Activity Indicator and Progress Bar need to be updated.
fields.summary: KitchenSink: Android: Need to update the Activity Indicator and Progress Bar test

comments.body:
PR for updating KS: https://github.com/appcelerator-developer-relations/KitchenSink/pull/31
PR for an Android bug: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/2893

For functional test: 
1. Run KS -> Controls -> Activity Indicator / Progress Bar on Android/iPhone/MobileWeb with master (3.0.0) with [PR 2893|https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/2893].
Note: The Progress Bar test does not work correctly on Android due to a bug which is fixed by [PR 2893|https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/2893]. Therefore, have to run this test with the platform PR.
2. Run KS -> Controls -> Activity Indicator / Progress Bar on Android/iPhone/MobileWeb with 2.1.2.GA to make sure nothing is broken.
